text: Fantastic news for 🇺🇸: almost 4M doses of #COVID19 #vaccine in arms yesterday. Hope we manage to get up to 10M per day in the weeks ahead to get ahead of #CovidVariants. We must focus on helping the dev world get vaccinated. No one is safe ‘til everyone is safe. #pandemic #LetsGo https://t.co/OpryhlCBW3
